content: पुष्करं [पुष्कं पुष्टिं राति, रा-क; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 4</ls>] {@--1@} A blue lotus. {@--2@} The tip of an elephant's tongue; <ls>Śi. 5. 30.</ls> {@--3@} The skin of a drum, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the place where it is struck; पुष्करेष्वाहतेषु <ls>Me. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 11.</ls> {@--4@} The blade of a sword. {@--5@} The sheath of a sword. {@--6@} An arrow. {@--7@} Air, sky, atmosphere. {@--8@} A cage. {@--9@} Water. {@--10@} Intoxication. {@--11@} The art of dancing. {@--12@} War, battle. {@--13@} Union. {@--14@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated place of pilgrimage in the district of Ajmere. {@--15@} The bowl of a spoon. {@--16@} A part, portion. --रः {@--1@} A lake, pond. {@--2@} A kind of serpent. {@--3@} A kind of drum, kettle-drum. {@--4@} The sun. {@--5@} An epithet of a class of clouds said to cause dearth or famine; <ls>Me. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 50.</ls> {@--6@} An epithet of Kṛshṇa. {@--7@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--8@} The Sārasa bird. {@--9@} An inauspicious conjunction of planets. --रः , --रं <ab>N.</ab> of one of the seven great divisions of the universe.
